title: In the Stanley Cup, Nazem Kadri Wanted to Be ‘in the Thick of It’
description: Colorado’s Nazem Kadri returned from an injury to win the Stanley Cup and a measure of redemption after having been criticized as being a liability in the playoffs.
dc:creator: David Waldstein
media:credit: Geoff Burke/USA Today Sports, via Reuters
media:description: Nazem Kadri ended his 13th N.H.L. season with his first championship.
